name: Picostar
description:
This is a clone of the Sinistar (1983) aracade game! It's being cloned in Pico 8

It's still in progress, and being developed while on twitch stream! https://www.twitch.tv/ironydaniel

I stream Fridays to Sundays starting at 20h CEST! Code updates after every stream!

Arrows to move, Z to shoot.
